entry.title: Roseburg Toastmasters invites new members to lunchtime meetings
entry.summary: Toastmasters International, the world’s largest public speaking club, includes a chapter in Roseburg and recently shifted its meeting time to Tuesdays at noon to better accommodate members and guests.

entry.title: LunchBox Express delivers free meals over Winter Break
